group_1.textRight: I see... Yesterday everyone was helping to clean up.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, we found something nostalgic.
I wanted you to come over and see it.

group_1.textRight: Did you show it to Tsuruno and everyone else?

group_1.textLeft: If anything,@they looked through all of it without permission.
Ever since yesterday,@they've been poking and prodding through it.

group_1.textRight: Hehe, of course everyone would be curious@about the story of the old Mikazuki Manor.

group_1.textLeft: Ah, I was wondering about that...
When it was a boarding house,@grandma taught me a platter recipe.
Everyone wanted to have a party to taste@the nostalgia, so they all went shopping.

group_1.textRight: You were fine with not going with them?

group_1.textLeft: I promised to have you@come to the house first.
So...this is what I wanted to show you.

group_1.textRight: That's the birthday present@we gave to grandma...

group_1.textLeft: Isn't it?

group_1.textRight: 'It would be a waste to use it'@is what she told us, but...
Grandma... You ended up using it after all.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah.@Why don't you take a look at the album?
Of course.

group_1.textRight: At this time, I was going to@Mikazuki Manor between sewing lessons...

group_1.textLeft: We were doing special training@as magical girls all of the time.
We were always so busy,@but every day felt fulfilling.

group_1.textRight: It's strange to think of the way I am now...
At that time, I was so@worried over every inconvenience...

group_1.textLeft: I wonder if I've grown up@enough to overcome my worries.
This was the first time the unit@used the house as a studio for a photoshoot...
Before shooting,@we talked with the Manager a lot, didn't we...
I had such a terrible face...
Grandma......you didn't have to@put such a terrible photo in here...
Our time of happiness didn't last@as punishment for making my wish...
